title: Tulane Medical Imaging Dataset (TMID)
description: A comprehensive collection of anonymized medical images including X-rays, CT scans, and MRI images from Tulane University Hospital. The dataset contains over 50,000 images with expert annotations for various pathological conditions.
accessRequirements: Institutional Review Board (IRB) approval and signed data use agreement required. Academic use only.

title: Clinical Notes NLP Corpus
description: De-identified clinical notes from electronic health records, processed and annotated for natural language processing research. Includes named entity recognition labels for medical concepts, medications, and clinical events.
accessRequirements: HIPAA training completion, IRB approval, and institutional data use agreement. Healthcare researchers only.

title: Genomic Variants and Drug Response Dataset
description: Curated dataset linking genomic variants to drug response outcomes across multiple therapeutic areas. Includes pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic data for precision medicine research.

title: Synthetic Healthcare Time Series Data
description: Artificially generated healthcare time series data that maintains statistical properties of real patient monitoring data while ensuring complete privacy. Suitable for algorithm development and testing.

title: Multi-Modal Cancer Research Dataset
description: Integrated dataset combining histopathology images, genomic data, and clinical outcomes for cancer research. Covers five major cancer types with longitudinal follow-up data.
accessRequirements: Cancer research focus, IRB approval, and collaborative agreement with Tulane Cancer Center required.
